amendment.description: To modify provisions relating to the interagency working group.

vote.text: Amendment SA 4016 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 4016 proposed by Senator Flake for Senator Alexander. (consideration: CR S6154; text: CR S6154) To modify provisions relating to the interagency working group.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 4016 proposed by Senator Flake for Senator Alexander.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 4016 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
